com.esri.gpt.server.assertion.components
Class AsnAuthPolicy

java.lang.Object
  com.esri.gpt.server.assertion.components.AsnAuthPolicy

public class AsnAuthPolicy
extends Object

Represents a configured authorization policy associated with an operation.
